casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Kevin Lamar HILL, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 154716
COA: 333566 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 20, 2018

Order

By order of January 3, 2018, this case was remanded to the Wayne Circuit Court and costs were imposed on attorney Suzanna Kostovski in the amount of $500. On the Court's own motion, we VACATE that part of the order imposing costs on attorney Kostovski.
